studyArms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment Arm
studyArms.description: Single-arm study where all participants receive ALXN1840 starting at 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days, followed by titration to 30 mg/day on Day 29.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '15 mg/day', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Initial treatment period'}, {'dose': '30 mg/day', 'startDay': 29, 'endDay': 40, 'description': 'Titrated treatment period'}]

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment experienced)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for > 28 days

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment naïve)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for ≤ 28 days

arms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment Arm
arms.description: Single-arm study where all participants receive ALXN1840 starting at 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days, followed by titration to 30 mg/day on Day 29.

cohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment experienced)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for > 28 days

cohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment naïve)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for ≤ 28 days

epochs.name: Screening
epochs.description: Up to 21 days prior to enrollment

epochs.name: Run-in Period
epochs.description: Day -7 through Day -1; includes diet equilibration and baseline copper/molybdenum balance measurement

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 1
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day 9; includes baseline assessment and initial 15 mg/day treatment phase

epochs.name: Outpatient Period
epochs.description: Day 9 to Day 23; participants continue 15 mg/day dosing at home

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 2
epochs.description: Day 23 to Day 40; includes 15 mg/day steady state assessment and titration to 30 mg/day

epochs.name: Follow-up
epochs.description: End of Study (EOS) or Early Termination (ET) procedures
